amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Defense to design and produce a military service medal to honor retired and former members of the Armed Forces who are radiation- exposed veterans (Atomic Veterans).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 115-702 to require the Secretary of Defense to design and produce a military service medal to honor retired and former members of the Armed Forces who are radiation- exposed veterans (Atomic Veterans).

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 408 - 1 (Roll no. 224).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. McGovern.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 408 - 1 (Roll no. 224).
